alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Citrus, western Pasco and western Hernando Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Homosassa Springs to Beacon Square. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Brooksville, Homosassa Springs, Hudson, Weeki Wachee, New Port Richey East, Crystal River Airport, North Brooksville, Homosassa, Jasmine Estates, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Pine Island, Hernando County Airport, North Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines, South Brooksville, Sugarmill Woods, Royal Highlands and Lecanto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco
